markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 629 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

An ability with this trait involves an attack. For each attack you make beyond the first on your turn, you take a multiple attack penalty.
name: Attack
